text: Nemai Ghosh (8 May 1934 - 25 March 2020) was an Indian photographer. He was most known for working with Satyajit Ray, as a Still photographer for over twenty years. His best works include Goopy Gyne Bagha Byne (1969) and Agantuk (1991). He was awarded the Padma Shri by the Government of India in 2010. Ghosh died on 25 March 2020 at a hospital in Kolkata from surgery-related problems, at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Indian artists Category:Photographers Category:People from Kolkata
title: Nemai Ghosh (photographer)
